definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: The sign here indicated where I should go.
sentences.chinese: 这个标识表记标帜指出了我该去的地方。

sentences.english: This is the sign of a person who is respected.
sentences.chinese: 那是一小我被敬服的标识表记标帜。

sentences.english: Display the total mark as an output.
sentences.chinese: 作为显示输出的总标识表记标帜。

sentences.english: X marks the spot for that clue, so look carefully.
sentences.chinese: “X”标识表记标帜着线索的地点，所以仔细视察。

sentences.english: The testing does not have errors, application has a good effect.
sentences.chinese: 测试没有表记误差，应用效果良好。

sentences.english: Want the look of a digital watch with the cachet of a classical timepiece?
sentences.chinese: 想看磕暌剐经典优异标识表记标帜的数字电子手表吗？

definition: banner/standard/variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
signature (in grass-style writing)/symbol used in place of a signature (on a document, contract etc)
to examine/to investigate/to try to determine
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
false name/pseudonym/alias/pen name/the Japanese kana scripts/hiragana 平假名[ping2 jia3 ming2] and katakana 片假名[pian4 jia3 ming2]
